definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: I'm not surprised that athletes always have athlete's feet.
sentences.chinese: 運動員總會有腳癬，這我一點也不奇怪。

sentences.english: Interdigital, or toe web infection, is the most common kind of athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 趾間或腳趾頭的感染，是腳癬中最常見的。

sentences.english: Continue treatment for 1-2 weeks after the infection has cleared to prevent it from recurring.
sentences.chinese: 在腳癬清除後持續治療一到兩週以防止復發。

sentences.english: A bad case of athlete's foot can drive you hopping mad.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重的腳癬能讓把人逼瘋。
